abstract: Stanford football team, led by Heisman Trophy candidate quarterback Andrew Luck, stays in the elite category of undefeated national title contender by defeating Southern California, 56-48, in triple overtime, keeping them in the thick of the Bowl Championship Series conversation.
snippet: Unbeaten Stanford, led by the Heisman candidate Andrew Luck, has joined L.S.U., Alabama and Oklahoma State in the thick of the Bowl Championship Series conversation.
lead_paragraph: Unbeaten Stanford, led by the Heisman candidate Andrew Luck, has joined L.S.U., Alabama and Oklahoma State in the thick of the Bowl Championship Series conversation.

headline.main: Stanford Gains in Title Talk With Victory Over U.S.C.
headline.print_headline: Stanford Gains in Title Talk With Victory Over U.S.C.
headline.seo: Stanford’s Win Over U.S.C. Puts It in National Title Race
